item.title: 三星为全球最畅销电视阵容增添人工智能生成器
item.description: 三星电子公司（Samsung Electronics Co., Ltd.）正在以 Vision AI 为品牌，为其高端电视阵容推出一套新的增强功能，从而扩大人工智能的推广范围。【原文：Samsung Electronics Co. is expanding its artificial intelligence push with a new suite of enhancements for its premium TV lineup under the branding of Vision AI.】

item.title: LG CNS 开始接受 2022 年以来韩国最大规模 IPO 的订单
item.description: LG 公司的技术服务部门开始接受在首尔首次公开募股的订单，这次募股可能会筹集多达 1.2 万亿韩元（8.16 亿美元）的资金，这将使其成为韩国三年来规模最大的首次公开募股。【原文：LG Corp.’s tech-services unit started taking orders for a initial public offering in Seoul that may raise as much as 1.2 trillion won ($816 million), which would make it South Korea’s largest IPO in three years.】

item.title: 亚洲货币指数因美联储和关税押注跌至二十年低点
item.description: 亚洲货币跌至二十年来的低点，因为美元仍然受到美国强劲增长和当选总统唐纳德-特朗普加征关税誓言的提振。【原文：Asian currencies fell to a two-decade low, as the dollar remains buoyed by robust US growth and President-elect Donald Trump’s tariff-hike vows.】

item.title: 亚太地区借款人掀起全球美元债券销售热潮
item.description: 在收益率溢价接近全球金融危机以来最低点的情况下，亚太地区的借款人拉开了今年全球债券发行最繁忙的一周的序幕，这是对投资者信贷偏好的一次重要考验。【原文：Borrowers from the Asia Pacific kicked off what looks set to be one of the busiest weeks of the year for bond issuance globally, in a key test of investor appetite for credit with yield premiums near their lowest since the global financial crisis.】

item.title: 高盛因美国降息次数减少而将黄金价格预测下调至 3,000 美元
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc. said it no longer sees gold reaching $3,000 an ounce by the end of the year, pushing the forecast to mid-2026 on expectations the Federal Reserve will make fewer rate cuts.】

item.title: 日本顶级液化天然气买家成立智囊团观察市场趋势
item.description: 据知情人士透露，日本最大的液化天然气买家和顶级公用事业公司 Jera Co.【原文：Jera Co., Japan’s largest liquefied natural gas buyer and top utility, created a think tank to research domestic and international energy trends, according to people with knowledge of the matter, following western oil giants trying to gain an advantage in the rapidly shifting market.】

item.title: 中国新年的阵痛可能预示着印度股市的上涨
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 日本股市因盈利和改革有望在 2025 年创下新高
item.description: 股票策略师表示，在公司治理改革和强劲盈利的推动下，日本股市有望在 2025 年再创新高。【原文：Japanese stocks are poised to renew record highs in 2025, driven by corporate governance reforms and robust earnings, according to equities strategists.】

item.title: 委内瑞拉挑战者将与拜登会面，向特朗普施压
item.description: 美国承认当选总统的委内瑞拉反对派领导人定于周一与美国总统乔-拜登会面，而此时距离唐纳德-特朗普接任美国总统还有几天时间，他将自行决定如何处理与这个无证移民主要来源国的关系。【原文：The Venezuela opposition leader the US has recognized as president-elect is scheduled to meet with President Joe Biden on Monday, days before Donald Trump takes over in the US and faces his own decision about how to handle relations with a country that’s a major source of undocumented immigrants.】

item.title: 越南 2024 年国内生产总值增长 7.09%，高于政府预期
item.description: 越南第四季度的经济增长速度超过预期，使 2024 年的全年增长速度远远超过政府的目标。【原文：Vietnam’s economy grew faster than expected in the fourth quarter, taking full year growth in 2024 well above the government’s target.】

item.title: 中国表示支持受压货币，金属走势平稳
item.description: 铝和锌接近三个多月来的最低水平，因为面对美元走强，中国发出了支持本国货币的信号。【原文：Aluminum and zinc held near their lowest levels in more than three months as China signaled support for its currency in the face of a strengthening US dollar.】

item.title: 受刺激政策影响，中国服务业指数升至五月份以来最高点
item.description: 一项民间调查显示，中国的服务业活动以 5 月份以来最快的速度增长，这表明在中国政府实施刺激政策之后，国内需求有所改善。【原文：China’s services activity expanded at the fastest pace since May, a private survey showed, signaling improving domestic demand after Beijing’s stimulus blitz.】

item.title: 中国宏桥自 2021 年以来首次发行长期美元债券
item.description: 中国最大的民营铝生产商--中国宏桥集团有限公司（China Hongqiao Group Ltd.）自 2021 年以来首次发行三年期美元债券，因为市场对以美元发行的中国债券的需求不断上升。【原文：China’s largest private aluminum producer, China Hongqiao Group Ltd., is marketing its first three-year dollar bond since 2021, amid rising demand for Chinese notes issued in the US currency.】

item.title: 中国维持对人民币的控制，定盘价强于 7.2 水平
item.description: 上周五人民币汇率跌破关键水平后，中国通过每日参考汇率维持对人民币的支持。【原文：China maintained its support for the yuan with the daily reference rate after the currency slumped past a key level on Friday.】

item.title: 美联储官员表达通胀担忧后黄金维持跌势
item.description: 由于美联储官员周末发表的言论强化了美国央行今年将采取更加谨慎的降息态度的观点，黄金保持跌势。【原文：Gold held a decline as comments from Federal Reserve officials over the weekend reinforced the view the US central bank will take a more cautious approach to cutting interest rates this year.】

item.title: 全球债务基金持续买入，韩国市场渡过危机
item.description: 韩国在与政治危机作斗争的同时，也避免了一场金融漩涡，这凸显了韩国市场在迅速努力安抚投资者的支持下已经成熟到了何种程度。【原文：South Korea was spared a financial maelstrom even as it battles a political crisis, underscoring the extent to which its markets have matured, bolstered by swift efforts to reassure investors.】

item.title: 拜登阻止美国钢铁收购后，新日铁下跌
item.description: 自美国总统乔-拜登阻止日本新日铁公司计划以 141 亿美元收购美国钢铁公司以来的首个交易日，新日铁公司股价周一下滑。【原文：Shares in Nippon Steel Corp. slipped on Monday, the first day of trading since US President Joe Biden blocked the Japanese company’s planned $14.1 billion takeover of United States Steel Corp.】

item.title: 特朗普困扰央行 2025 年谨慎降息
item.description: 全球央行行长们准备在 2025 年进一步削减借贷成本，但他们只是谨慎行事，并密切关注即将上任的美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的政策。【原文：Global central bankers are poised to cut borrowing costs further in 2025, but only warily — and with a keen eye on the policies of incoming US President Donald Trump.】

item.title: 在 2008 年赚取数十亿美元的交易员重返市场，押注市场波动
item.description: 一位前对冲基金经理的公司在全球金融危机期间赚取了数十亿美元，他认为市场稳定面临的威胁达到了自2008年以来从未有过的程度，因此准备再次扑向波动。【原文：A former hedge fund manager whose firm made billions during the global financial crisis is ready to pounce on volatility again, as he sees threats to market stability at a level not seen since 2008.】

item.title: 以下是 2025 年亚洲最值得关注的上市公司
item.description: 由于印度的首次公开募股管道依然强劲，香港的复苏势头也在持续，交易商们预计 2025 年亚洲的首次公开募股将出现复苏。【原文：Dealmakers are eyeing a revival in Asia’s initial public offerings in 2025 as India’s pipeline remains robust and a recovery in Hong Kong takes hold.】

item.title: 中国政府解决产能过剩问题，中国炼油厂面临倒计时
item.description: 中国独立炼油厂今年将面临一场清算，因为中国政府要解决该行业产能过剩的问题，而它们所依赖的原油也将变得更加稀缺。【原文：China’s independent oil refineries face a reckoning this year as Beijing tackles overcapacity in the industry, and the crude they rely on becomes a lot scarcer.】

item.title: 石油维持在两个月高位附近，股市将高开
item.description: 在经历了两周的上涨之后，石油价格在更广泛的市场风险情绪的推动下保持稳定。【原文：Oil was steady after two weeks of gains, buoyed by a risk-on tone in wider markets.】

item.title: 据说 Paychex 正在洽谈收购规模较小的竞争对手 Paycor
item.description: 据知情人士透露，Paychex 公司正在就收购薪酬处理领域规模较小的竞争对手 Paycor HCM 公司进行深入谈判。【原文：Paychex Inc. is in advanced talks to acquire Paycor HCM Inc., a smaller rival in payroll processing, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 华尔街反弹后亚洲股市将上涨：市场综述
item.description: 在华尔街结束了五天连跌之后，亚洲股市在大型科技股的新一轮需求帮助下，周一在主要市场出现上涨。【原文：Asian equities were primed to rise in major markets on Monday after Wall Street snapped a five-day losing streak, helped along by fresh demand for big tech stocks.】

item.title: 调查显示：英国企业信心降至特鲁斯迷你预算案以来最低点
item.description: 英国商会（British Chambers of Commerce）的一项调查显示，英国企业信心已降至两年多前保守党前首相利兹-特拉斯（Liz Truss）发布灾难性小型预算案以来的最低水平，这与人们对现任工党政府增税的担忧不谋而合。【原文：UK business confidence has dropped to its lowest level since former Conservative Prime Minister Liz Truss’s disastrous mini-budget more than two years ago, according to a survey by the British Chambers of Commerce that echoes concerns over the current Labour government’s tax hikes.】

item.title: 拜登在罕见的公开签字仪式上签署社会保障法案
item.description: 乔-拜登（Joe Biden）总统签署了一项法案，该法案将增加数百万美国人的社会保障福利，这是他两年多来首次举行公开法案签署仪式。【原文：President Joe Biden signed into law a bill that will increase Social Security benefits for millions of Americans — his first public bill signing ceremony in more than two years.】

item.title: 人民币交易员期待中国人民银行定盘价衡量外汇支持水平
item.description: 人民币走软，跌破了中国在整个 12 月一直捍卫的水平，这让人们重新关注中国管理货币的每日参考汇率，以衡量中国政府支持人民币的意愿。【原文：The yuan weakening past a level that China had been defending throughout December has returned the spotlight to its daily reference rate for the managed currency to gauge Beijing’s appetite to support it.】

item.title: IPhone 供应商 TDK 推出新型电池，与人工智能保持同步
item.description: TDK 公司是苹果公司 iPhone 手机电池的主要供应商之一，今年将推出其最先进产品的改进版，以帮助移动设备跟上内置人工智能不断增长的电力需求。【原文：TDK Corp., one of the main suppliers of batteries for Apple Inc.’s iPhones, will this year roll out an improved version of its most advanced product to help mobile devices keep up with the rising power demands of built-in AI.】

item.title: 本周全球商品市场值得关注的五大图表
item.description: 2024 年，全球一篮子主要大宗商品均有所上涨，部分原因是黄金走势强劲。咖啡和可可是原材料中表现最好的，这让巧克力爱好者和咖啡饮用者非常懊恼，因为他们渴望更低的价格。美国最大储存中心的原油库存已降至 2007 年以来的季节性最低水平。【原文：A basket of the world’s key commodities rose in 2024, helped in part to gold’s stellar run. Coffee and cocoa were top performers among raw materials, much to the chagrin of chocolate lovers and coffee drinkers yearning for lower prices. And crude oil stockpiles at the largest US storage hub have fallen to the lowest seasonal level since 2007.】
